data.actual_result: No messages, users or voice statusses gets loaded. Users become visible as their statusses change and messages can be loaded manually. You can even join a voice channel and listen to spooky ghost users that aren't visible.
data.expected_result: Users, voice statusses and messages are loaded as normal
data.short_description: Joining a *large* guild while invisible will cause messages, users and voice channel statusses to not load
data.steps_to_repro: - Go invisible - Join a large guild with over ~100 users
